T10nrat_2_u:1: na kiṃcit puruṣas tadvat pāṭitaḥ saha dhātubhiḥ // RATNA_02.01
T10nrat_2_u:2: sarvadharmā anātmāna ity ato bhāṣitaṃ jinaiḥ /
T10nrat_2_u:3: dhātuṣaṭkaṃ ca taiḥ sarvaṃ nirṇītaṃ tac ca nārthataḥ // RATNA_02.02
T10nrat_2_u:4: naivam ātmā na cānātmā yāthābhūtyena labhyate /
T10nrat_2_u:6: dṛṣṭaśruṭādyaṃ muninā na satyaṃ na mṛṣoditaṃ /
T10nrat_2_u:7: pakṣāddhi pratipakṣaḥ syād ubhayaṃ tac ca nārthataḥ // RATNA_02.04
T10nrat_2_u:9: asmād eva ca tattvena nopaity asti ca nāsti ca // RATNA_02.05
T10nrat_2_u:10: yac caivaṃ sarvathā neti sarvajñas tat kathaṃ vadet /
T10nrat_2_u:11: sāntam ity athavānantaṃ dvayaṃ vādvayam eva vā // RATNA_02.06
T10nrat_2_u:12: asaṃkhyeyā gatā buddhās tathaiṣyanty atha sāṃpratāḥ /
T10nrat_2_u:13: koṭyagraśaś ca sattvāntas tebhyas traikālyajo mataḥ // RATNA_02.07
T10nrat_2_u:15: sarvajñena kathaṃ tasya pūrvānto 'vyākṛtaḥ kṛtaḥ // RATNA_02.08
T10nrat_2_u:16: etat tu dharmagāmbhīryaṃ yat tad guhyaṃ pṛthagjane /
T10nrat_2_u:18: māyāgajasya dṛśyeta yathā janmānta eva ca /
T10nrat_2_u:19: na ca kaścit sa tattvena janmāntaś caiva vidyate // RATNA_02.10
T10nrat_2_u:21: dṛśyate paramārthena na ca janmānta eva ca // RATNA_02.11
T10nrat_2_u:22: yathā māyāgajo naiti kutaścid yāti [ 6b ] na kvacit /
T10nrat_2_u:24: tathā māyopamo loko naiti yāti na kutracit /
T10nrat_2_u:27: yo 'sti nāsty athavāpi syād anyatra vyavahārataḥ // RATNA_02.14
T10nrat_2_u:29: buddhena hetor nānyasmād ayam avyākṛtaḥ kṛtaḥ // RATNA_02.15
T10nrat_2_u:31: satataṃ dṛśyamānāpi yadā citte na tiṣṭhati // RATNA_02.16
T10nrat_2_u:35: durjñānam atigāmbhiryāj jñātvā dharmam imaṃ janaiḥ // RATNA_02.18
T10nrat_2_u:41: subhuktenāyur ārogyaṃ balaṃ saukhyāni cāśnute // RATNA_02.21
T10nrat_2_u:43: samyagjñātenātra sukhaṃ bodhiṃ cāpnoty anuttarāṃ // RATNA_02.22
T10nrat_2_u:44: tasmād atra pratikṣepaṃ dṛṣṭiṃ tyaktvā ca nāstikīṃ /
T10nrat_2_u:47: tataḥ śubhāśubhaṃ karma tato janma śubhāśubhaṃ // RATNA_02.24
T10nrat_2_u:51: sādhayan dharmaniṣṭhāni neha nāmutra sīdati // RATNA_02.26
T10nrat_2_u:52: dharmāt kīrtiḥ sukhaṃ caiva neha bhīr na mumūrṣataḥ /
T10nrat_2_u:53: paralokasukhaṃ sphītaṃ tasmād dharmaṃ sadā bhaja // RATNA_02.27
T10nrat_2_u:54: dharma eva parā nītir dharmāl loko 'nurajyate /
T10nrat_2_u:55: rañjitena hi lokena neha nāmutra vañcyate // RATNA_02.28
T10nrat_2_u:56: adharmeṇa tu yā nītis tayā loko 'parajyate /
T10nrat_2_u:57: lokāparañjanāc caiva neha nāmutra nandati // RATNA_02.29
T10nrat_2_u:59: anarthavidyā duṣprajñair arthavidyā kathaṃ kṛtā // RATNA_02.30
T10nrat_2_u:61: yena janmasahasrāṇi bahūny ātmaiva vañcyate // RATNA_02.31
T10nrat_2_u:62: ripor apriyam anvicchan dosāṃs tyaktvā guṇān śraya /
T10nrat_2_u:63: svahitāvāptir eva tu ripos cāpy apriyaṃ bhavet // RATNA_02.32
T10nrat_2_u:65: ebhir ācara lokasya dharmasyaiva ca saṅgrahaṃ // RATNA_02.33
T10nrat_2_u:66: viśvāsaṃ janayaty ekaṃ satyaṃ rājñāṃ yathā dṛḍhaṃ /
T10nrat_2_u:67: tathaivābhūtam apy eṣām aviśvāsakaraṃ paraṃ // RATNA_02.34
T10nrat_2_u:70: doṣān pracchādayaty ekas tyāgo rājñāṃ yathojjvalaḥ /
T10nrat_2_u:71: tathā kārpaṇyam apy eṣāṃ guṇasarvasvaghātakaṃ // RATNA_02.36
T10nrat_2_u:73: gauravād dīptir ājñā ca tasmād upaśamaṃ bhaja // RATNA_02.37
T10nrat_2_u:75: nātisandhīyate rājā tasmāt prajñāparo bhava // RATNA_02.38
T10nrat_2_u:77: dharmaś caturbhadra iva stūyate devamānuṣaiḥ // RATNA_02.39
T10nrat_2_u:79: sahāsīnasya satataṃ prajñā dharmaś ca varddhate // RATNA_02.40
T10nrat_2_u:82: pathyam apy apriyaṃ tasmāj jñātvā śīghraṃ samācara /
T10nrat_2_u:83: pibed auṣadham apy ugram ārogyāyātmavān iva // RATNA_02.42
T10nrat_2_u:85: tataḥ saṃvegavān dharmam ekāntena prayāsyase // RATNA_02.43
T10nrat_2_u:86: avaśyaṃ maraṇaṃ paśyan pāpād duḥkhaṃ mṛtasya ca /
T10nrat_2_u:87: aihikena sukhenāpi na pāpaṃ kṣātum arhasi // RATNA_02.44
T10nrat_2_u:88: kasmiṃś ced abhayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kvacit kṣaṇe /
T10nrat_2_u:89: yady ekasmin samāśvāsaḥ kim ekasmin na te bhayaṃ // RATNA_02.45
